content.query:
DROP TABLE Accidents
CREATE TABLE dbo.Accidents
	( 
		 [Accident_Index] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
[Location_Easting_OSGR] VARCHAR(30),
[Location_Northing_OSGR] VARCHAR(30),
[Longitude] VARCHAR(30),
[Latitude] VARCHAR(30),
[Police_Force] INT,
[Accident_Severity] VARCHAR(30),
[Number_of_Vehicles] INT,
[Number_of_Casualties] INT,
[Date] NVARCHAR(400),
[Day_of_Week] INT,
[Time] TIME,
[Local_Authority_(District)] INT,
[Local_Authority_(Highway)] VARCHAR(20),
[1st_Road_Class] INT ,
[1st_Road_Number] INT,
[Road_Type] INT,
[Speed_limit] VARCHAR(4) NULL,
[Junction_Detail] INT,
[Junction_Control] INT,
[2nd_Road_Class] INT,
[2nd_Road_Number] INT,
[Pedestrian_Crossing-Human_Control] INT,
[Pedestrian_Crossing-Physical_Facilities] INT,
[Light_Conditions] INT,
[Weather_Conditions] INT,
[Road_Surface_Conditions] INT,
[Special_Conditions_at_Site] INT,
[Carriageway_Hazards] NVARCHAR(400),
[Urban_or_Rural_Area] INT,
[Did_Police_Officer_Attend_Scene_of_Accident] INT,
[LSOA_of_Accident_Location] NVARCHAR(400)

	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH([Accident_Index]),
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)


--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_Accidents
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.[Accidents] 
FROM 'https://iiiplaytestgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/powerbi/Synapse_RTC/NonSensitive/*/*/*/dftRoadSafety_Accidents.csv'

 WITH (
     FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
     ,CREDENTIAL=[ADLSStorageKey]
			 ,FIRSTROW = 2
			 
      )

--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Accidents
GO
